news.title: Team Australia has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Hong Kong has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Japan has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Taiwan has registered for the Asian Cup 2025

news.description:
🇦🇺 Australia played a friendly match against 🇺🇾 Uruguay as part of their preparation for Asian Cup 2025.
Final score: 4–3 (9–6)
news.title: Australia defeats Uruguay 4–3 in a friendly ahead of Asian Cup 2025
Team Thailand has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team China has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Malaysia has registered for the Asian Cup 2025
Team Vietnam has registered for the Asian Cup 2025

news.description: Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 will take place on August 2nd at 14:00 UTC (22:00 UTC+8) on the WTCOC Discord
news.short_title: Asian Cup draw: Aug 2 on Discord
news.title: Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 to be held on August 2nd at 22h UTC+8
Draw for Carcassonne Asian Cup 2025 has been completed

news.description: The first match of Asian Cup 2025 is set! Last year's champion 🇭🇰 Hong Kong will face 🇦🇺 Australia on Sunday at 11:00 UTC (19h UTC+8)
news.title: First match of Asian Cup 2025 scheduled: Hong Kong vs Australia this Sunday

news.description:
All Round 1 matches of the Asian Cup 2025 have been scheduled! All 4 matches
🇹🇼 vs 🇻🇳
🇹🇭 vs 🇲🇾
🇦🇺 vs 🇭🇰
🇯🇵 vs 🇨🇳
will be played on Saturday and Sunday
news.title: All Round 1 matches of Asian Cup 2025 are scheduled for this weekend

news.description: In Round 1 of Group A at the Asian Cup 2025, 🇹🇼 Taiwan defeated 🇻🇳 Vietnam 5–0 (10–0), while 🇹🇭 Thailand beat 🇲🇾 Malaysia 4–1 (8–4)
news.title: Taiwan and Thailand claim strong wins in Asian Cup 2025 Round 1 Group A

news.description: The reigning Asian Cup 2024 champion 🇭🇰 Hong Kong defeated 🇦🇺 Australia 4–1 (8–2)
news.title: Reigning Asian Cup champion Hong Kong wins in Round 1

news.description: In an exciting clash of WTCOC champions, five-time winners 🇯🇵 Japan defeated one-time winners 🇨🇳 China 3–2 (7–6)
news.title: In WTCOC champions clash, Japan claims victory
Asian Cup 2025 Round 1 completed

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan has all but secured a playoff berth after defeating last year’s Asian Cup champions 🇭🇰 Hong Kong in Round 2 3–2 (6–5)
news.title: Japan defeats Hong Kong to secure playoff spot at Asian Cup 2025
Asian Cup 2025 Round 2 completed

news.description: 🇹🇼 Taiwan guaranteed a place in the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after defeating 🇲🇾 Malaysia in Round 2 5–0 (10–2). With two wins, Taiwan is already through!
news.title: Taiwan secures semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025

news.description: 🇹🇭 Thailand guaranteed a place in the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after beating 🇻🇳 Vietnam in Round 2 3–2 (7–5). With two wins, Thailand is already through!
news.title: Thailand secures semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025

news.description: 🇭🇰 Hong Kong claimed the final ticket to the semifinals of the Asian Cup 2025 after defeating 🇨🇳 China in the last round 3–2 (7–5)
news.title: Hong Kong clinches last semifinal spot at Asian Cup 2025
Asian Cup 2025 group stage completed — semifinalists decided

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan marches towards another trophy, defeating 🇹🇼 Taiwan in the semifinal 4–1 (8–4) to book their place in the final of the Asian Cup 2025
news.title: Japan beats Taiwan to advance to Asian Cup 2025 final

news.description: 🇹🇭 Thailand reached the final of the Asian Cup 2025 after a dramatic semifinal win over 🇭🇰 Hong Kong 3–2 (7–4)
news.title: Thailand defeats Hong Kong in semifinal to reach Asian Cup 2025 final

news.description: 🇯🇵 Japan are the Asian Cup 2025 champions! In a thrilling final they defeated 🇹🇭 Thailand 3–2 (7–6). Thailand finishes as silver medalist for the second year in a row.
news.title: Japan crowned Asian Cup 2025 champion after dramatic final

news.description:
🇯🇵 Japan has done it again! With 5 wins out of 6 WTCOC editions, they cement a true era of dominance ☀️
In the final, Japan defeated 🇨🇱 Chile 4–1.

🏆 Japan 🇯🇵
🥈 Chile 🇨🇱
🥉 Ukraine 🇺🇦

Details: WTCOC 2025
news.title: Japan crowned five-time World Team Carcassonne Champions

news.description:
A new format for CCL 2026 has been announced! The league stage will be replaced by a group stage. More details coming soon.
See here: CCL 2026
news.title: New format announced for Carcassonne Champions League 2026
